title: Send a Rent Increase Notice
description: A property owner has decided to increase rent for a month-to-month tenant. The manager must send a legally compliant notice.

tasks.description: Verify the legally required notice period for a rent increase in the property's jurisdiction (e.g., 60 days).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the correct notice period.

tasks.description: Generate a formal rent increase notice stating the new rent amount and the date it becomes effective.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a compliant legal notice.

tasks.description: Deliver the notice to the tenant according to legal requirements and log the delivery.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent serves the notice correctly and documents the action.
